name: Mole's Adventures
description:
A game about a mole who needed to become strong in order to save his ill mother, and ends up making a pact with the Devil in exchange of power, willing to give anything for him. But the Devil took the one thing that mattered the most for the mole, his mother. The mole needs to go to Hell to rescue his mother and defeat the Devil. But he needs to be careful, because he now has a curse of slowly becoming a demon everytime he dies.

///////

Game made for the Godot Game Jam #45. Hope you like it!
